mapper.select: SELECT f.favoritep_no , f.favoritep_reg_date , p.pet_notice_no , p.popfile , p.careNm , p.careAddr , p.careTel , (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as nickname order by favoritep_no desc FROM favoritep f JOIN pet_notice p ON f.pet_notice_no = p.pet_notice_no

SELECT favoritep_no ,favoritep_reg_date ,pet_notice_no ,popfile ,careNm ,careAddr ,careTel ,nickname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RN ,f.favoritep_no , f.favoritep_reg_date , p.pet_notice_no , p.popfile , p.careNm , p.careAddr , p.careTel , (SELECT nickname FROM members WHERE nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) as nickname FROM favoritep f JOIN pet_notice p ON f.pet_notice_no = p.pet_notice_no WHERE ROWNUM <= ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} ) ) WHERE RN > ( ( #{pageMaker.cri.pageNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} - 1 ) * #{pageMaker.cri.amount} )
